title: Investigating the efficacy of green solvents and solvent-free conditions in hydrogen-bonding mediated organocatalyzed model reactions
content:
RSC Adv., 2024, 14,7992-7998
DOI: 10.1039/D4RA00679H, Paper
Open Access
Â  This article is licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution-NonCommercial 3.0 Unported Licence.
Lloyd C. Chetty, Hendrik G. Kruger, Per I. Arvidsson, Tricia Naicker, Thavendran Govender
The efficacy of green solvents and neat conditions in organocatalysed reactions were investigated. The results suggest cyclopentyl methyl ether and neat conditions could serve as alternatives, potentially enhancing the processes' sustainability.
